nodes.text: Yindo was an Ithorian male who served the Galactic Republic during the Cold War. He was stationed on the Gav Daragon. During the Rakghoul pandemic in the Tion Hegemony he transported a Republic strike team to Kaon.
Yindo serves as the quest giver for the Republic version of the Flashpoint Kaon Under Siege in  Star Wars: The Old Republic.
